  • Field Details

    • stepsBack

      protected int stepsBack
      Represents the number of steps a player is required to move back when interacting with an enemy in the context of the game. This variable is configurable and can be set or retrieved by the corresponding setter and getter methods in the class.

    • requiredFirePower

      protected int requiredFirePower
      Represents the firepower required to defeat the enemy. This value is used to determine the player's necessary strength to overcome the enemy during gameplay.

  • Method Details

    • setStepsBack

      public void setStepsBack(int stepsBack)
      Sets the number of steps the player or entity must move back when encountering this enemy.
      Parameters:
      stepsBack - the number of steps to move back

    • setRequiredFirePower

      public void setRequiredFirePower(int requiredFirePower)
      Sets the required firepower for the enemy.
      Parameters:
      requiredFirePower - the firepower value required to overcome the enemy

    • getStepsBack

      public int getStepsBack()
      Retrieves the number of steps to move back associated with the current enemy.
      Returns:
      the number of steps the player is required to move back

    • getRequiredFirePower

      public int getRequiredFirePower()
      Returns the required firepower needed to defeat the enemy.
      Returns:
      the required firepower as an integer
